attributes.additional_details: Imagen if you were a senior employee at a bank and your boss walked up to you and said "your are to small for this job so pack up your stuff and leave!" you wouldn't want this to happen to you so way would you do this to Pluto.
attributes.background: Remember when Pluto was a planet. How would you like to be changed and lose your position just because you are smaller. join me in getting Pluto back on its feet and make itself a planet again!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
